law.catch_line: Picked-up employee pension contributions not considered an increase or decrease in employee salaries.
law.text: The pick up of employee pension contributions pursuant to Acts 1982, ch. 166, shall not be construed as either an increase or a decrease in the amount budgeted for employee salaries by the state or any other employer affected by Acts 1982, ch. 166.
law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 166, sec. 14, effective July 15, 1982.
